name: Return (Slambert)
description:
In Return you play as an alien making your way through a military facility, trying to figure out what has happened to your planet.

Return provides a new take on the classic sci-fi narrative, allowing you to experience the conflict from the other side.

  • Isometric twin-stick shooter

  • Dark sci-fi setting

  • Play an alien discovering the fate of their civilization

  • Game has combat which leads up to final boss

  • PC using an Xbox controller

This game was made by,

Kyle Gordon, Chris Grierson, Shane Lambert, Simon Furrer, Dayne Johnson, Ho Yin Wong.
